snippet: By sifting through recent changes in the law, taxpayers can make some strategic moves toward the next filing season.
abstract: Taxpayers, by sifting through recent changes in law, can make some strategic moves toward next filing season; issues to consider are discussed.
lead_paragraph: By sifting through recent changes in the law, taxpayers can make some strategic moves toward the next filing season.

headline.seo: Tax-Law Changes Make It Even Wiser to Plan Ahead
headline.main: Planning Ahead, With an Eye on Tax Changes
headline.print_headline: Planning Ahead, With an Eye on Tax Changes
